name: Neon Jumps (Romilio Games)
description:
Neon Jumps is a high-intensity physics-based infinite runner. Time your jumps and master the rhythm of the platforms to earn the highest score possible. As you progress through the level, you will be challenged with platforms that progressively raise in difficulty until you face rage-worthy obstacles that will question your abilities!

Key features:

  - Physics-Based

  - Customization

  - Online leaderboards

  - Challenge/Progression System

  - Unlocking unique characters

  - Neon environment

In Neon Jumps, you can change your character's skin, as well as the character's model to better suit your needs. Different models allow unique ways to play the game from one another. Stay tuned to see more unique ones in the future!

Within this world, you are placed in a 3D neon landscape filled with platforms that continuously appear in front of you to test your abilities. But be careful, you must be quick or the platforms will disappear before your eyes!

Note:
  • This game is scheduled to be released on Android devices.
  • The game isn't specifically built for Windows PCs. Mobile phones were the devices first in mind, which is why the game is locked at 1080p with graphics lowered for performance on mobile devices & and the framerate is set to 60fps (locked).
  • Included are debug features such as deleting all data, showing FPS, and getting 10,000 currency (found in settings).
  • You can add your leaderboards to the online leaderboards but all scores will be deleted once the final build is released on Android devices (you can resubmit your high score once the full game is released).
  • There are no ads in the Windows buid.
  • This version of the game is pre 0.9.0
